mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_chat(chat_room_id, user_id, context, view_at,created_at) values (#{chatRoomId},#{userId},#{context},#{viewAt},now());
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_chat SET context = #{context}, view_at = #{viewAt} WHERE chat_id = #{chatId};
mapper.select: SELECT a.chat_room_id , a.user_id , a.context as message , b.username , concat(CASE WHEN date_format(a.created_at, "%p") = 'AM' THEN '오전' ELSE '오후' END , date_format(a.created_at, " %I:%i")) AS created_at FROM tb_chat a JOIN tb_user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE a.chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId} AND a.created_at >= #{startAt} ORDER BY a.chat_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_chat(chat_room_id, user_id, context, view_at,created_at) values (#{chatRoomId},#{sendUserId},#{message}, 1,now());
mapper.select: SELECT concat(CASE WHEN date_format(created_at, "%p") = 'AM' THEN '오전' ELSE '오후' END , date_format(created_at, " %I:%i")) AS created_at FROM tb_chat WHERE chat_id = #{chatId};
